H0.text: Predation is the relationship between the birds and snakes in the same ecosystem that both depend on the same mouse species as a food source.

H1.text: Mutualism is the relationship between the birds and the snakes, who both depend on the same mouse species as a food source in the same ecosystem.

H2.text: Competition is the relationship between the birds and the snakes in the same ecosystem that both depend on the same mouse species as a food source.

H3.text: Commensalism is the relationship between the birds and the snakes, both of which depend on the same mouse species as a food source in the same ecosystem.

A4.text: Leopards and lions can also be in interspecific competition, since both species feed on the same prey...
